sub_title: Tax director | Value chain transformation | Transfer pricing | International tax management | Cross-border IP planning | Operating model effectiveness
summary:
Experienced international tax director. Skilled in transfer pricing, international tax planning, tax strategy, business restructuring and tax audits. Possess deep working knowledge of the OECD and UN model tax treaties and the international landscape of tax principles, tax laws, and regulations.

Reliable and delivering results towards business partners. Functioning as a natural link between tax, finance and the business. Optimistic with a hands-on approach. Strong drive to build a high-performance team.

Specific knowledge areas:
Value  chain transformation. Transfer pricing. International tax management. Cross-border IP planning. Operating model.  Operational transfer pricing. Strategic agenda. Risk management. Tax audit & controversy management. Tax technology.

Look forward to meeting you!
Joris.reijnierse@pwc.com
